articles.title: Chiefs' Jones owns up to not chasing Lawrence
articles.summary: Seen watching as Trevor Lawrence scrambled for the Jaguars' winning touchdown over the Chiefs, Chris Jones said he will do better going forward and that such an incident "won't happen again."

articles.title: Shedeur: Whatever Browns role is 'I'm thankful'
articles.summary: Shedeur Sanders said Thursday he'll be fine with whatever decision Browns coach Kevin Stefanski makes on the team's backup quarterback role following the trade of Joe Flacco.

articles.title: 49ers QB Jones limited in practice, but optimistic
articles.summary: With Brock Purdy likely out, 49ers quarterback Mac Jones was limited in practice Thursday, leaving Adrian Martinez to take first-team reps.

articles.title: Bengals say Flacco trade gives team 'a chance'
articles.summary: Bengals' receiver Ja'Marr Chase said that the team trading for Joe Flacco is a sign of the belief the franchise still has for this season.

articles.title: Kelly defends play choices in wake of Carroll call
articles.summary: Raiders offensive coordinator Chip Kelly defended his playcalling Thursday, a day after coach Pete Carroll critiqued the offense by saying it should run the ball more and incorporate more play-action.

articles.title: Ex-Fins safety Jones awarded $9.5M in fraud suit
articles.summary: Former Dolphins safety Reshad Jones has settled a lawsuit against Merrill Lynch for $9.5 million after a former financial adviser allegedly stole $2.59 million from the two-time Pro Bowler.

articles.title: Bills WR Coleman calls benching a 'growing pain'
articles.summary: Bills wide receiver Keon Coleman said that he's "got to be more accountable" after being benched for the first series of the team's Week 5 loss to the Patriots due to what coach Sean McDermott said was disciplinary reasons.

articles.title: Dak, 32, hopeful to keep playing into his 40s
